title: WinLongRenamerTool v1.0a - Renamer Tool for explorer bug - Windo
description:
WinLongRenamerTool v1.0a - Renamer Tool for explorer bug - Windows 95 ro Win 8 for long names exceeding folder depth - Reseed (2014)



need unrar to unrar/unzip the exe in it..

note! made with autoit script language.. some virus scanner will falsely say
its a trojan


was created... because p2p client like utorrent can download in to sub folders
and with filenames being long can exceed the max length 

windows explorer cant handle.. and wont allow you to play, delete or move
the file (s) or folder(s)

the bug exists in all windows versions since long name was implemented (inc win 8)

ideal in future to make a new partition on your drive with minitool partition
freeware tool for downloads 

so can tell p2p to download to the root folder of that partition e.g.

D:


Enjoy and HELP reseed this useful tool
